mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (USERNO, USERID, USERPW, NAME, GENDER, ADDR, HP, EMAIL, REGISTERDAY, INTEREST, ACTIVE, ROLE) values (DEFAULT, #{userid}, #{userpw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{addr}, #{hp}, #{email}, DEFAULT, #{interest}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_user where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update tb_user set code = #{code} where userid = #{userid}
